alert.note: Alert for Anderson; Blount; Grainger; Jefferson; Knox; Union (Tennessee) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued January 03 at 1:57PM CST until January 03 at 2:15PM CST by NWS Knoxville
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 315 PM EST FOR EASTERN ANDERSON...KNOX...NORTH CENTRAL BLOUNT...WEST CENTRAL JEFFERSON...SOUTHWESTERN GRAINGER AND SOUTHERN UNION COUNTIES... At 256 PM EST, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Maynardville to 8 miles northeast of Knoxville to near Louisville, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Knoxville, Alcoa, Maynardville, Farragut, Louisville, Plainview, Rockford, Strawberry Plains, Halls and Blaine. This includes the following highways... Interstate 40 in Tennessee between mile markers 369 and 401. Interstate 75 in Tennessee between mile markers 108 and 119. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.

area.areaDesc: Anderson; Blount; Grainger; Jefferson; Knox; Union
